instructions: Go to Settings > Privacy, then turn on Location Services. Go to Settings > [ your name ] > Share My Location, then turn on Share My Location. Tap From, then select the device you want to share your location from.

On iPhone, open Find My Friends, then tap Add. Do one of the following: In the To field, type the name of a friend you want to share your location with (or tap the Add Contact button , and select a contact), then tap Send and choose how long you want to share your location. Select a friend who appears in AirDrop and choose how long you want to share your location.
On iPhone, open Find My Friends. Tap the person you want to locate. The person appears on a map so you can see where they are.

Select a friend, then tap Notify Me. Choose whether you want to be notified when a friend leaves from or arrives at a location. Choose the friend s current location, or tap Other to create a new location for the notification.
